post.body: this is ur 2nd winter in chi-town right?
may the force be with chris on this momentus day. lol
quietdrive plays a mean cover of cyndi laupers time after time love it. how did the show go?
hope the show goes well. update us when it's over.
have a great show
damn! How many did u put in there?
icksnay those subliminal messages k?
my bday is saturday march 21st lets do it then lol
I'm more like begging for a week or two delay so I have time to recover from the Bahamas cruise. Help a girl out here Flash.
early march doesn't work. Going on cruise. Make it mid March.
so when can we expect a cd release party?
just finished winning $20,000 for Cinder Road. Wish i could help u like that!
EXCELLENT
show lake geneva what cavashawn's all about! ROCK OUT!
have a great show tmrw. was gonna try to come but dad in hospital.
holy crap batman be safe driving weather is shitty this way
oh i feel ya on crappy sleep. Are u starting your journey home tonight?
Have a great last show of the East Coast tour tonight guys!
yeah right. you are up talking to me right now. LOL
what am i missing?
good to hear! have a wonderful time at home. hope to see u in the new year.
next time jesse :-)
go east on 30 and it will take u right into fort wayne and it will be merry christmas to me!
same happened here with freezing rain on my 40 min ride into work this morning. it sucks. blahhh.
Thanking God the test results showed no active cancer in me at this time! Thank you Jesus!
